content:
All the goods I need for the shop,
Every last bit is here and ready!

content: How strange... after drinking Captain Mo's tea, I'm getting... sleepy... now... huh?!

content:
For Sani, she'll definitely need a car repair toolkit,
And then, I remember she really likes this certain soda pop-pop,
There's an ad sticker on her car, and oh yeah, running shoes too!

content:
I found a bunch of forgotten charcoal coffee cups deep inside the box! What a wonderful surprise.
       <size=30>Their color made them so hard to spot, no wonder I missed them...</size>

content:
I've connected with neighboring shops along the Astralink,
and we're trading goods with each other...
And then!

content:
Frostia often uses a telescope,
she needs maintenance tools,
and different kinds of hair ribbons and hair care oils.

content:
Mm, I'm updating my "Endless Needs Notebook,"
Getting to know everyone's daily routines better,
So I can stock more items that match what everyone likes.

content:
Hm? Those stacked boxes over there?
They're all empty boxes.
       <size=30>But stacking empty boxes high makes me happy...</size>

content:
Umm...!
M-maybe I shouldn't have called her 'big sis' just like that...
P-please don't tell anyone about this... <style=SizeSmall>I really hope no one heard that...</style>

content:
This must be Captain Mo's special tea recipe!
I've got to write it down, write... it... down... huh?!
No sleeping! I still need to clean the Camp!

content:
The scratched kettle got a brand new coating,
The dented floor lamp just needed a fresh bulb,
And the snagged carpet's been rewoven good as new.

but then, I figured a tent with wheels would suit you better.

       <size=30>maybe they'll need a small desk lamp...</size>

content:
